display_html:
data TypeError
  • = Mismatch {
    • t1 :: Type
    • t2 :: Type
    • srcPos2 :: Expr SourcePos
    • srcPos :: SourcePos
    }
  • | NotBound {
    • name :: Name
    • srcPos :: SourcePos
    }
  • | SigMismatch {
    • name :: Name
    • sigType :: Type
    • actualType :: Type
    • srcPos :: SourcePos
    }
  • | Unknown {
    • msg :: String
    • srcPos :: SourcePos
    }
  • | BadOp {
    • op :: Op
    • t1 :: Type
    • t2 :: Type
    • srcPos2 :: Expr SourcePos
    • srcPos :: SourcePos
    }
  • | OutOfBounds {
    • xpos :: Pos
    • ypos :: Pos
    • srcPos :: SourcePos
    }
  • | BadApp {
    • name :: Name
    • arg :: Expr SourcePos
    • srcPos :: SourcePos
    }
  • | Dereff {
    • name :: Name
    • typ :: Type
    • srcPos :: SourcePos
    }
  • | Uninitialized {
    • name :: Name
    • srcPos :: SourcePos
    }
name: TypeError Uninitialized Dereff BadApp OutOfBounds BadOp SigMismatch NotBound Mismatch Unknown actualType sigType srcPos srcPos2 typ ypos xpos op t2 t1 msg arg name
